text: István Fehér (6 March 1954 - 4 March 2021) was a Hungarian wrestler. He competed in the men's freestyle 74 kg at the 1980 Summer Olympics. Fehér was born in Nagykőrös, Hungary. Fehér died in March 2021, two days before his 67th birthday. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympians for Hungary Category:Hungarian wrestlers
title: István Fehér
